Baltimore.Baltimore Theatre Project:
The Baltimore Theatre Project is an internationally recognized performing arts center located at 45 West Preston Street in Baltimore, Maryland.


== Early years ==
The Baltimore Theatre Project was founded in 1971 by Philip Arnoult as an appendage to Antioch University, with the objective of offering world-class alternative theatre, free of charge, to Baltimore audiences. Such diverse theatre companies as Pilobolus Dance Theater, Urban Bush Women, Bread and Puppet Theatre, Studio Scarabee, the IOWA Theatre Lab, and Spider Woman Theatre were invited to perform throughout the 1970s.
